formattedAddress: 519 W 207th St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 519 W 207th St, New York, NY 10034-2645, USA

originalText.text: Long story short...UPS lost my package, sent claim paperwork to UPNYC and they keep telling me they received nothing. After I sent email proof, they responded back with " we can give you store credit" all because you have to purchase there $10 insurance . I asked for a refund and now I am back in the loop with no response. I have been dealing with this since May 12th!!..we are now in June.... any other company would have gotten this taken care of ..they are refusing a refund. Even after I said screw it, I will take the credit....no response. I will never buy from this store again. ...not to mention,before all of this I had 3 orders cancelled by them after waiting weeks with no shipping updates...be very careful with this store.

originalText.text: I can confidently say these people will never do anything for this community all they care about is money . Shopped here for tonnes of releases never got a single one

text.text: I can confidently say these people will never do anything for this community all they care about is money . Shopped here for tonnes of releases never got a single one

originalText.text: Walked into the store nobody greeted us, the customers. They watched us walk in and the workers continued the conversation they were having at the register. No one came to ask if we needed help with anything. Literally shouted to ask for a size I wanted and eventually I left with nothing because who really wants to spend money somewhere that has no customer service. I really expected better since fat joe is the face of the store. I can go to any other hood store like this and I’ll get more customer service.

originalText.text: Cool Staff, I won a pair of sneakers that I wanted for a long time from their raffles via Social media. This location has a wide variety of clothes and sneakers for the family.

originalText.text: This store is so awesome. Love the customer service and the energy is just great.
